metadata.name: Suspicious Remote Child Process From Outlook
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious child process spawning from Outlook where the image is located in a remote location (SMB/WebDav shares).

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\outlook.exe')) AND startswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious child process spawning from Outlook where the image is located in a remote location (SMB/WebDav shares).
